abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the device supports basic interaction-session functionality.
overview:
## Discussion

### Check the Device’s Supported Features

In iOS 16 and watchOS 9, check a device’s supported features with [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NISession/deviceCapabilities] instead of calling this function.

The value of the [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIDeviceCapability/supportsPreciseDistanceMeasurement] device capability is equivalent to this property, as demonstrated in the following code.
title: isSupported
